p: During the year of follow-up, 242 samples were collected (153 at home and 89 during a visit to the center), a mean of 9.7 ± 2.1 samples per patient. Out of the 85 RTIs clinically identified, 64 samples (75%) were collected during symptoms occurrence, while 21 samples were not realized. Out of 64 RTIs sampled, 44 (69%) were associated with the identification of a viral agent (Fig. 2 flow chart of virus sample results).
